title: Nissan targets 1 million car sales growth over next three years
description: Nissan Motor unveiled plan to launch 30 new models by March 2027, targeting 1 million increase in global sales. Nissan is focussing on cost-cutting for profitability, aiming for 6% operating profit margin and 30% shareholder returns.
